attributes.action: to plant 10,000 new street trees in london paid for by scrapping the major's propaganda sheet the londoner and freeing up investment of at least £4 million over 4 years . The money saved could be used for increaseing the numbers of police officers patroling tube stations and buses .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would help areas of london which there is a lot of traffic congestion and reduce carbon emissions in those areas.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
